data.title: Steffan Mos - Football
data.meta_description: Steffan Mos (40) Punter  - Mos spent two seasons as the backup punter at Cal, seeing all of his action in two games off the bench as a 2012 sophomore in back-to-back
data.text:
Mos spent two seasons as the backup punter at Cal, seeing all of his action in two games off the bench as a 2012 sophomore in back-to-back contests at Ohio State and USC. Mos did not use his final season of eligibility and is on track to graduate from Cal in the summer of 2014 with a bachelor’s degree in interdisciplinary studies.

Pronunciation

STEPH-un moss

Career Stats

Game Logs: 2012

Cal Career (2012-13)

► Played in two games off the bench as a 2012 sophomore and punted twice for 75 yards and a 37.5 yard average, with a long of 57 at Ohio State that pinned the Buckeyes at their own four-yard line

► Did not use his final season of collegiate eligibility

Junior (2013)

► Did not play

► Punted twice for an average of 46.0 yards in the spring game

Sophomore (2012)

► Played in two games off the bench and punted twice for 75 yards and a 37.5 yard average, with a long of 57 at Ohio State that pinned the Buckeyes at their own four-yard line

► Also had an 18-yard punt at Ohio State

► Got in another game at USC but did not have a punt attempt

Grossmont College (2011)

► Played one season as a 2011 freshman and earned second-team All-Southern California Football Association honors

► Averaged 40.8 yards per punt and pinned opponents inside their 20-yard line on 17 occasions

► Selected as a National Football Foundation Scholar-Athlete

► Named his squad’s Special Teams Player of the Year

► Selected the Special Teams Player of the Week according to the East County Times for his performances in back-to-back victories at Orange Coast College and vs. College of the Canyons

► First Cal player to attend Grossmont College since Joe Roth in 1973 and 1974

Clairemont HS (Class of 2011)

► Averaged 42.6 yards per punt as a 2010 senior, while also serving as his squad’s placekicker and scoring 52 points on seven field goals, 27 extra points and a pair of two-point conversions that he ran

► Added one forced fumble on a kickoff during his senior campaign

► Posted a 36.5 punting average as a 2009 junior, while scoring 40 points on three field goals and 31 extra points

Other

► Full name is Steffan Jacobus Mos

► Born September 25, 1991

► Parents are Dennis and Denise Mos

► On track to graduate from Cal in the summer of 2014 with a bachelor’s degree in interdisciplinary studies

Mos' Career Game Highs

Punts: 2 (at Ohio State, 2012)

Punting Yards: 75 (at Ohio State, 2012)

Punting Average: 37.5 (at Ohio State, 2012)

Long Punt: 57 (at Ohio State, 2012)

50+ Yard Punts: 1 (at Ohio State, 2012)

Inside 20-Yard Line Punts: 1 (at Ohio State, 2012)
